data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in Salt Lake.
In the minute 2, Salt Lake drive forward but Corey Baird is judged offside.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Malik Badawi signals a throw-in for Salt Lake, close to Seattle's area.
Salt Lake's Corey Baird breaks free at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 6, Seattle have a goal kick.
Salt Lake's Justin Meram misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 8, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Salt Lake.
Malik Badawi awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 14, Malik Badawi signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Seattle's half.
Throw-in for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Salt Lake needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Seattle in Sandy.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Xavier Arreaga (Seattle) has received a yellow card from Malik Badawi.
In the minute 20, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 22, Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Salt Lake's Aaron Herrera gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Seattle to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Attention is being given to Seattleâ€™s Handwalla Bwana and play has been suspended briefly.
Seattle's Handwalla Bwana looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 27, Malik Badawi awards the home team a throw-in.
Seattle have been given a penalty...
Aaron Herrera (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 29, Goal! Nicolas Lodeiro gives Seattle a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Malik Badawi signals a Seattle throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 32, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 33, Can Salt Lake capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sandy.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 39, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Xavier Arreaga has recovered and rejoins the match in Sandy.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Xavier Arreaga.
In the minute 41, Salt Lake awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
Malik Badawi awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Seattle.
Salt Lake's Justen Glad attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Goal kick for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Free kick Seattle.
At Rio Tinto Stadium the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Seattle's Cristian Roldan gets in a shot on goal at Rio Tinto Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
At Rio Tinto Stadium, Damir Kreilach has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is underway in Sandy.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 48, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
Malik Badawi signals a Seattle throw-in in Salt Lake's half.
Salt Lake to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Seattle.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Goal! Salt Lake draw level to 1-1 through a Justen Glad header.
In the minute 50, Albert Rusnak instrumental with a fine assist.
Salt Lake have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
In the minute 54, Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
Jordan Morris is replacing Handwalla Bwana for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Seattle advance rapidly upfield but Malik Badawi blows for offside.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 57, Freddy Juarez is making the team's first substitution at Rio Tinto Stadium with Giuseppe Rossi replacing Maikel Chang.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Malik Badawi awards the home team a throw-in.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
Great shot from Salt Lake's Albert Rusnak but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 64, Justin Meram (Salt Lake) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Seattle.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sandy.
In the minute 66, Throw-in Seattle.
Throw-in for Seattle in their own half.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Salt Lake.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Malik Badawi.
Yeimar Gomez Andrade heads in to make it 1-2 at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In the minute 69, That's a fine assist from Alex Roldan.
The home team have replaced Justin Meram with Sam Johnson. This is the second substitution made today by Freddy Juarez.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Joao Paulo is replacing Jordy Delem for the away team.
Seattle make their third substitution with Joevin Jones replacing Nouhou Tolo.
Can Seattle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Salt Lake's half?
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Salt Lake.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Malik Badawi blows against Seattle's Raul Ruidiaz for offside.
In the minute 75, Malik Badawi signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Seattle's half.
Free kick Salt Lake.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Marcelo Silva (Salt Lake) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
In the minute 79, Throw-in Seattle.
Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Seattle.
In the minute 80, Malik Badawi awards Seattle a goal kick.
Joao Paulo for Seattle has been booked by Malik Badawi and receives a first yellow card.
Seattle are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a fourth substitution, with Kelvin Leerdam replacing Alex Roldan.
In the minute 83, The away team replace Raul Ruidiaz with Will Bruin.
Giuseppe Rossi (Salt Lake) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Pablo Ruiz gets an equalizer for Salt Lake. The score is now 2-2.
Malik Badawi awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Seattle to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Kyle Beckerman is on a sub for Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake.
The home team replace Albert Rusnak with Everton Luiz.
In the minute 88, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Sandy a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Salt Lake at Rio Tinto Stadium.
Malik Badawi signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Malik Badawi awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Seattle at Rio Tinto Stadium.
In Sandy, Seattle push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Sandy. The final score is 2-2.
Corey Baird (Salt Lake) gets a yellow card.
